War Within is the debut album by American rock band Any Given Sin, released on August 4, 2023. The band supported the album with a North American tour with Shallow Side.
Track listing
#"War Within" - 3:33
#"Calm Before the Storm" - 3:44
#"Another Life" - 3:39
#"Cold Bones" - 3:43
#"Follow You" - 3:23
#"Insidious" - 3:34
#"Ball and Chain" - 3:20
#"The Way I Say Goodbye" - 3:27
#"House on Fire" - 3:26
#"Dynamite" - 3:48
#"Still Sinking" - 3:39

*Mike Conner - guitar
*Rich Stevenson - bass
*Mike Showalter - drums
